info.description: write your function to graph in tab [Common]
info.name: 2D vector field visualizer

renderpass.name: Image
Buffer A

renderpass.code:
#define bM 300. //max balls in screen
#define bT 3.   //balls tail length
#define bZ 1.   //size of balls
#define vR 1.   //visual range from -vR to vR
vec2 vectorField2D(vec2 p)
{
    vec2 v = p.yx*vec2(-1,1);  //calculate vector
    return p + v*.01;          //update position
}
renderpass.name: Common
